meanings.sent1: She musses her hair before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: He always musses his hair when he wakes up.
meanings.sent3: The wind musses her hair into a wild tangle.
meanings.sent4: The playful puppy musses up the child's hair with its paws.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous toddler musses his hair with chocolate pudding.

meanings.definition: A state of disorder or untidiness.
meanings.sent1: The room was in a complete muss after the party.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the muss in her workspace.
meanings.sent3: The muss of papers on his desk made him laugh.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a beautiful muss of wildflowers.
meanings.sent5: The artist's studio was a creative muss of paints and brushes.
